Subclass/Dual Class Certificate Manager Trandon:
You can obtain new powers if your main class and dual class both exceed level 85. You can't get these powers unless you are certified with your dual class and main class. I'll help you obtain new powers if you have the certificates. So, will you give me that dual class certificate and acquire the power contained within [npc_%objectId%_subclass_DualCertificationSkillList|"Of Course!"]
